document_data.mainbody:
roud Keth was a fierce and deadly warrior whose life ended in battle many years before the late 13 century DR.
Proud Keth was remembered as the first owner of a unique enchanted Myrkulyte belt – the Belt of Bones. He wore the belt into countless battles in which Keth was a force of nature, killing anything and anyone who stood in his way. In rare moments when Proud Keth surrounded, he tapped into the belts magic, surrounding himself with a circle of bones that rent and shredded the enemies around. Keth was killed in a battle in which his enemies used the warriors strategy against him. They used polearms and spears to end Proud Keth from a safe distance. After the warriors death, he was interred wearing the  Belt of Bones, but his grave was soon desecrated and looted, the belt – stolen.
